intro: Rokejeka, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its vibrant, velvety petals and compact growth habit. The plant typically has dark green, velvety leaves and produces clusters of flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. Rokejeka thrives in moist, well-drained soil and prefers indirect sunlight. It is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
